file_content.text: [The monolith pulses with the life force of Subject 13.]
Lord Mohgren told me you would be here. I am his apprentice, and--Subject 13? You defeated him?
Subject 13 said I had to sacrifice myself for his freedom. That wasn't going to happen.
We can still release him. If this prison permitted his death, he would have killed himself centuries ago.
I have no excuse. Luckily, the prisoner is only weakened. If his death were possible here, he would have killed himself centuries ago.
Does he look alive to you?
I'm, well, you've weakened Subject 13, but he still lives. If death provided an escape, he would have killed himself centuries ago.
Subject 13. You have been vanquished. Now take my mind, and serve the Empire. It is your only choice!
He obeys. Tell Lord Mohgren of my glory!
